meanings.definition: Lack of intelligence or good judgment.
meanings.sent1: His softheadedness led him to believe everything he heard without questioning.
meanings.sent2: Her softheadedness in that situation caused her to make a poor choice.
meanings.sent3: The softheadedness of the character in the movie made everyone laugh at his silly actions.
meanings.sent4: The team's softheadedness in strategy cost them the game.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of his softheadedness were evident in the failed project.

meanings.definition: The state of being foolish or easily swayed.
meanings.sent1: She fell victim to softheadedness and believed the scammer's lies.
meanings.sent2: His softheadedness made him an easy target for manipulation.
meanings.sent3: The softheadedness of the puppy chasing its tail was adorable to watch.
meanings.sent4: The politician's softheadedness in the debate was evident to all.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of softheadedness can be serious if not recognized and corrected.

meanings.definition: A tendency to make irrational decisions.
meanings.sent1: His softheadedness often led him to choose the riskiest option.
meanings.sent2: The team's softheadedness in planning resulted in chaos.
meanings.sent3: The softheadedness of the cat trying to catch its own shadow was amusing.
meanings.sent4: Ignoring the warnings showed his softheadedness in action.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of softheadedness can be avoided with careful consideration.
